seo.title: Naples Airport to Positano by Bus – Step-by-Step
seo.description: Take the Curreri shuttle to Sorrento, then the SITA bus to Positano (Chiesa Nuova). Photos, timetable tips, and walking directions to Hostel Brikette.

linkLabel: Naples Airport to Positano by Bus – Step-by-Step

sections.title: Curreri shuttle + SITA bus overview
body: Tip 1: For the Sorrento to Positano timetable, %URL:https://www.positano.com/en/bus-schedule?route=sorrento_positano_amalfi|check the official schedule%.Tip 2: For Naples Airport to Sorrento, %URL:https://www.curreriviaggi.it/it/navetta-aeroporto-di-napoli|see Curreri Viaggi% (select \\"Da Napoli Aeroporto - Per Sorrento\\"). You can also buy your shuttle ticket there.

sections.title: Departing Naples Airport
body: Exit the arrivals hall straight to the bus stands. Buy a Curreri Viaggi ticket to Sorrento (online or at the kiosk) and wait at the marked bay. Coaches run roughly every 60-90 minutes; in peak months arrive 15 minutes early to secure a seat.

sections.title: At Sorrento bus station
body: - Disembark at Sorrento's main station, which is both the train and bus hub.- From the forecourt, board the SITA bus toward Amalfi (Positano is an intermediate stop).- Need a ticket? Buy from the bar or newsstand next to the stands before you queue.- When you board, the driver will stamp or tear your ticket. Keep it handy for inspectors.

sections.title: Reading the SITA timetable
body: The SITA timetable lists stops as rows and lettered journeys as columns. Match your departure stop with the column letter for your travel day: Monday–Saturday trips are under columns F and G; Sunday and public holiday departures are under G and H.

sections.title: Arriving at Positano (Chiesa Nuova)
body: Stay on the bus until the Chiesa Nuova stop in Positano. It sits about 140 m (450 ft) from the hostel outside Bar Internazionale. Use the photo to confirm you're at the right place before you hop off.

sections.title: Walk from Chiesa Nuova to the hostel
body: From the stop, walk a little over 100 m / 330 ft along Via G. Marconi.Turn right at the small lane and follow the steps up to our front door.Want turn-by-turn directions? %URL:https://www.google.com/maps/dir/bar+internazionale/hostel+brikette/@40.6295534,14.479394,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m13!4m12!1m5!1m1!1s0x133b976673927785:0x5187a720325ee588!2m2!1d14.482264!2d40.629495!1m5!1m1!1s0x133b97669dd0003b:0xf11f22a59b1b00da!2m2!1d14.480818!2d40.629634|Open the same route in Google Maps%.

sections.title: Tip: Spot the hostel entrance
body: As you approach, look for the Hostel Brikette sign by the second-floor terrace. Walk past it, follow the bend in the road, and climb the stairs on the right to reach reception.
